title: Quarkus 2.7.0.Final released - Quarkus CLI maturing, Interactive terminal, Oracle Reactive SQL Client...
content: 2-2-2022 would have been a perfect day to release a 2.2.2.Final version of Quarkus but we didnâ€™t get that lucky. Today we announce the release of Quarkus 2.7.0.Final. 2.7.0.Final comes with a lot of refinements and new features: Lots of improvements for the Quarkus CLI, that has now been published...
